title: Which of the following methods are available to limit the amount of resources available to PHP through php.ini? (Choose 2)

choices.a: Limit the amount of memory a script can consume
choices.b: Limit the total amount of memory PHP uses on the entire server
choices.c: Limit the maximum execution time of a script
choices.d: Limit the maximum number of concurrent PHP processes
choices.e: Limit the maximum number of concurrent PHP threads
